title: Mariyamfranklin
author: Mariyamfranklin
content: Koinpark is a global crypto exchange platform. Koinpark provides a better user interface, 24/7 customer support, and diverse trading pairs. Sign up now at Koinpark and get 1 lakh SHIB, an extra 25000 SHIB for each referral. Visit Koinpark site and know more about rewards and campaigns

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Why not move this to exchanges because Koinpark is an exchange.The exchange was founded this year. It is not that long and I prefer old exchanges. The exchange has a 24-hours trading volume of $4780276This exchange was created this year 2023. https://coinmarketcap.com/exchanges/koinpark/If the exchange continue to function, I may start to use it.

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Judging from all the posts you have made since you created this account, it’s obvious this account was created to promote your exchange. Creating multiple accounts to shill an exchange or give positive reviews will only arouse suspicion and make people doubt if the exchange is genuine. There is a right way to do these things, you should create a ANN thread like others have done and tell us why we should trust a new exchange like yours.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on October 18, 2023, 10:31:30 AMJudging from all the posts you have made since you created this account, it’s obvious this account was created to promote your exchange. Creating multiple accounts to shill an exchange or give positive reviews will only arouse suspicion and make people doubt if the exchange is genuine. There is a right way to do these things, you should create a ANN thread like others have done and tell us why we should trust a new exchange like yours. I don't think the Op is the owner of the exchange; someone who is knowledgeable enough to develop an exchange will know how to market it and know that this is not the right way to create awareness for his business, as a professional proper ANN thread will do just fine and every piece of information needed can be found there.What I think is that the exchange might have just hired the wrong marketing team, which the OP appears to be part of, and the person who is in charge of the marketing might not even be checking what the OP is doing. What they know is that the information has been made public on Bitcointalk.The exchange is new, and they have a pretty good amount for daily trading volume. That's if those figures are real and not just some random number given to be made public.

comments.author: cafter
comments.body: Quote from: Mariyamfranklin on October 18, 2023, 09:44:57 AMKoinpark is a global crypto exchange platform. Koinpark provides a better user interface, 24/7 customer support, and diverse trading pairs. Sign up now at Koinpark and get 1 lakh SHIB, an extra 25000 SHIB for each referral. Visit Koinpark site and know more about rewards and campaignsOP, you sound like a TV ad, Next time you want to share something then consider providing more information about the platform such as trading fees, withdrawal fees, trading volume, etc., so we can think about using their platform.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Orpichukwu on October 18, 2023, 10:40:39 AMWhat I think is that the exchange might have just hired the wrong marketing team, which the OP appears to be part of, and the person who is in charge of the marketing might not even be checking what the OP is doing. What they know is that the information has been made public on Bitcointalk.That is most likely the case.A small exchange with a small budget hires a crappy firm to do marketing for a couple of hundred dollars, those try to make it with just 10% of the sum and they hire some idiot on Fiverr to do 5 posts on social media websites and forums.Now fast forward, the exchange gets suspicious looks for this and a $ loss, and rather than new customers trying it you have older ones advising everyone to stay away from a business with such practices. Mission accomplished!Anyhow, this doesn't change the previous user assumption:Quote from: Orpichukwu on October 18, 2023, 10:40:39 AMQuote from: SatoPrincess on October 18, 2023, 10:31:30 AMJudging from all the posts you have made since you created this account, it’s obvious this account was created to promote your exchange. I don't think the Op is the owner of the exchange; He said created, not that it's the owners themselves posting this.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Mariyamfranklin on October 18, 2023, 09:44:57 AMKoinpark is a global crypto exchange platform. Koinpark provides a better user interface, 24/7 customer support, and diverse trading pairs. Sign up now at Koinpark and get 1 lakh SHIB, an extra 25000 SHIB for each referral. Visit Koinpark site and know more about rewards and campaignsI am not always comfortable when exchanges promise so much benefit to their customers. Yeah, it could be a marketing strategy to attract customers since it is a new business but it could also be a bait. People's ugly experience with centralised platforms is enough lesson to be careful with them.   Quote from: Orpichukwu on October 18, 2023, 10:40:39 AMThe exchange is new, and they have a pretty good amount for daily trading volume. That's if those figures are real and not just some random number given to be made public.This thread Proof of reserves? Insurance fund? Best I can do is a random number generator! will let you know that these centralised platforms can do anything to attract customers and gain their confidence. Just bear in mind that any figure can be manipulated. Quote from: stompix on October 18, 2023, 10:54:48 AMQuote from: Orpichukwu on October 18, 2023, 10:40:39 AMQuote from: SatoPrincess on October 18, 2023, 10:31:30 AMJudging from all the posts you have made since you created this account, it’s obvious this account was created to promote your exchange. I don't think the Op is the owner of the exchange; He said created, not that it's the owners themselves posting this.@SatoPrincess referred to the OP as the owner of the exchange.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: As per checking most of your content is related to Koinpark, like you are promoting your platform, instead, create your own ANN thread so the members will check with your platform if it is reliable or not. People will appreciate the platform with proper marketing promotions and not like spamming your exchange like that.Also it's suitable if you move your thread to trading discussion. Use the move button on the lower left side of your main thread.

comments.author: stompix
comments.body: Quote from: Die_empty on October 18, 2023, 10:58:47 AM@SatoPrincess referred to the OP as the owner of the exchange.Thanks for pointing that out, probably low on caffeine, I read it and understood it more like the exchange you mentioned rather than ownership of it. Things like your list, your solution, bla bla...!Since I don't want to make the same mistake again:Quote from: Die_empty on October 18, 2023, 10:58:47 AMQuoteSign up now at Koinpark and get 1 lakh SHIB, an extra 25000 SHIB for each referral. I am not always comfortable when exchanges promise so much benefit to their customers. Isn't 1 laks shiba something like 60 cents? And 25k something like 17 cents?

comments.author: AHOYBRAUSE
comments.body: Quote from: SatoPrincess on October 18, 2023, 10:31:30 AMJudging from all the posts you have made since you created this account, it’s obvious this account was created to promote your exchange. Creating multiple accounts to shill an exchange or give positive reviews will only arouse suspicion and make people doubt if the exchange is genuine. There is a right way to do these things, you should create a ANN thread like others have done and tell us why we should trust a new exchange like yours. I wanted to post the same thing when I checked his posting history.Why even promote it without any affiliate code or whatever.And if OP is an official representative of this exchange he should be upfront about it and not just throw in some random info and expect people to become curious about the site.  We see this quite often these days unfortunately.

comments.author: taufik123
comments.body: Quote from: stompix on October 18, 2023, 11:30:37 AMQuote from: Die_empty on October 18, 2023, 10:58:47 AMQuoteSign up now at Koinpark and get 1 lakh SHIB, an extra 25000 SHIB for each referral. I am not always comfortable when exchanges promise so much benefit to their customers. Isn't 1 laks shiba something like 60 cents? And 25k something like 17 cents?LOL 60 cents for registration and must do KYC. Selling identity for only 60 cents :3. Can't give a bigger reward, 60 cents is not even enough for the transaction fee :3Quote from: AHOYBRAUSE on October 18, 2023, 12:38:17 PMI wanted to post the same thing when I checked his posting history.Why even promote it without any affiliate code or whatever.And if OP is an official representative of this exchange he should be upfront about it and not just throw in some random info and expect people to become curious about the site.  We see this quite often these days unfortunately.Maybe he is an employee of the exchange or maybe just a volunteer.It is India's local exchange and I just found out about it. This kind of promotion is not good marketing, people will look down on it because there is no intention to promote an exchange platform professionally. A good promotion would be to hire Influencers who will make a bigger impact, rather than just posting on forums with the title "Start crypto trading at Koinpark". There is no benefit and no reason I should switch from my favorite exchange to Koinpark Exchange.

comments.author: Husires
comments.body: You are promoting them incorrectly. All the information you mentioned is available on all platforms and you did not mention important points such as withdrawal limits, KYC, trading volumes, withdrawal fees, and speed of executing orders.The platform is new and needs to provide attractive offers, as less than a dollar to complete registration after verifying the identity is far from being attractive, especially not to mention that the platform is new and data can be stolen. reduce the data you collect in order to gain some trust.

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: Quote from: Peanutswar on October 18, 2023, 11:10:47 AMAs per checking most of your content is related to Koinpark, like you are promoting your platform, instead, create your own ANN thread so the members will check with your platform if it is reliable or not. People will appreciate the platform with proper marketing promotions and not like spamming your exchange like that.Since the OP is not the owner of the exchange so he cannot create an ANN thread to officially promote the exchange, he may have been part of a marketing campaign but unfortunately he used the wrong method that gave negative results instead.OP you've got yourself into a problem that you don't know how to get out of because of the wrong approach you've taken. You've got everyone giving negative opinions about centralized exchange without even trying it.We have a popular proverb that says: “The goods offered are cheap,” because even if the goods are good, people think, why would he offer his goods to us if they were not bad or had a defect? You have to learn how to display your goods so that people can appreciate their value.
